alert.note: Alert for Blaine (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 11 at 3:05AM CDT until July 11 at 6:45AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 615 AM CDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Portions of central and northwest Oklahoma, including the following counties, in central Oklahoma, Kingfisher. In northwest Oklahoma, Blaine. * WHEN...Until 615 AM CDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 305 AM CDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts up to 2 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Watonga, Kingfisher, Okarche, Okeene, Canton, Longdale, Hitchcock, Loyal, Eagle City, Canton Lake, Omega, Southard, Homestead and Lacey.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
